_note: This is Weebo64's personal blog data. Pull requests modifying posts will not be accepted. Feel free to fork and use this structure for your own blog!

posts.title: Welcome to my blog!
posts.content: This is my first blog post. I'll be sharing updates about my projects, modding adventures, and whatever else is on my mind. Stay tuned!

posts.title: rough day
posts.content:
today wasnt really a great day for me. my mental health gotten worse and im getting sad every single time.

i was able to talk to my friends on the Insane Kart Wii Discord Server and watched them play the game. i listen to some music and played some retro rewind.

it helped a bit but yeah. just wanted to get this off my chest i guess.
